articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The UK moves to 'warfighting readiness' and warmer spring weather helps pubs splashes on Monday's front pages.
articles.title: Newspaper headlines: 'UK sends warning to Putin' and 'wish you were beer'

articles.description: The BBC's Paul Adams reflects on the impact of Ukraine's major drone attack on Russian bombers.
articles.title: Ukraine's audacious drone attack sends critical message to Russia - and the West

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Campaigner and presenter, who was scarred in an acid attack, says not fearing ageing "scares some people."
articles.title: Katie Piper: 'Ageing can be compared to a bereavement'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Warsaw Mayor Rafal Trzaskowski claims early victory but his winning margin is well within margin of error, exit poll suggests.
articles.title: Polish presidential election too close to call, exit poll suggests

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky claims the operation is Ukraine's biggest long-range attack of the war so far.
articles.title: Ukraine drones strike bombers during major attack in Russia

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The defence review on Monday is expected to recommend the armed forces move to "warfighting readiness".
articles.title: UK to build up to 12 new attack submarines

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Sam Gardiner featured in the second series of the TV show with his mum Jo in 2020.
articles.title: Former Race Across the World star Sam Gardiner dies after crash

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Set in suburban Utah, the series follows a group of Mormon women, most of whom rose to fame on TikTok.
articles.title: Secret Lives of Mormon Wives on swinging scandals, friendship fallouts and religious backlash

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Ernest Williams, 90, has been fighting for more than 40 years to get the pension he says he deserves.
articles.title: Military veteran has 'burning fire' to correct pension 'robbery'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Some patients are skipping meals due to a shortage of Creon, says a pharmacy association.
articles.title: Pharmacists warn drug shortage affecting cancer patients
